sub title plan: Make your business stand out! Attract passing customers with your best deals and invites by choosing one of the following subscription plans:
Basic description: Post your ads for passing customers for a month at a single business location, with access to basic ad stats.
Premium description: Post your ads for passing customers for a month in 5 business's branches location, with access to premium ad stats.
Enterprise description: Post your ads for passing customers for a month in unlimited business,s branches location, with access to enterprise ad stats.
